Text:
This is just the x86 versions of win7sp1 brought up to date with kb files, directx runtime, ie9, and dotnet 4.5.  The purpose is to fit on a single layer 4.5gb dvd.  If you want the version with all 11 windows options brought up to date for dual layer dvd or flash drive, you want this:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7619127/Windows_7_SP1_AIO_11in1_x64_x86_IE9_.Net_4.5_Sep10_2012
There are a few updates available that just got hotfixed on sep11, but I will not make a new version of this until the Tuesday patch day in October. So don't fear downloading this for the time being.
It's English(US) setup, but I believe you can change language and download language packs if you wish in some the versions.  Definitely in ultimate, you can download language packs.
It's saying that I have "28 days to activate". Is that right?
Very right. Use the Windows Loader to activate it, it's in the Activation Cracks Folder, root of the DVD.

Thank you for your very appreciate efforts.

MSupdate+IE9+.Net 4.5+Directx June 2010 runtimes for me it's the perfect installation package :D
